page.title: 06Wetton school bus and Fetes
page.content: We ran out of deisel so we pushed it to the petrol station and we filled up the tank. Whenever I go on the school bus it smells of perfume. We have a driver on our bus. We have curtains on our little minibus. It is bumpy across the moors. We can see through the windows. We have a radio. There are speakers so we can listen to the music. We have a floor on our minibus which squeaks a bit when you walk on it. There are nineteen seats and one emergency door. {Wetton and Grindon Fetes} The Wetton fete this year was held on 29th June. Although it rained, a lot of people turned up and crammed into the old schoolrooms. There were competitions like Guess the weight of the bull and a fancy dress. Wetton fair is being held on the playing fields this year.
